Class: ImagerJs

RedactorPlugins. ImagerJs

new ImagerJs(options) → {Object}

Redactor plugin wrapper for ImagerJs that allows to use all ImagerJs functionality inside redactor's editor.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object ImagerJs Redactor options.
Options are splitted into two objects: 'preview' and 'redactor'.
Those options are passed directly intp ImagerJs instance when its created.
'preview' options will be passed only to ImagerJs on modal window when selecting image.
'redactor' options will be passed to ImagerJs when image is inside redactor editor.
Example options: 
 {
   preview: {
     quality: 0.9,
     targetScale: 0.5,
     plugins: ['Resize', 'Crop', 'Rotate', 'Toolbar']
   },
   redactor: {
     plugins: ['Resize', 'Crop', 'Rotate', 'Toolbar', 'Properties']
   }
}
Properties
Name Type Description
hideFileSelection If true, file selector will be hidden once file is selected.
Source:
  • RedactorPlugin.js, line 52
Returns:
Type
Object
